alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 22 at 12:13AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong winds drifting snow onto roads creating slick driving conditions through the evening... Strong winds continue to be observed in east-central Nevada which is blowing snow onto roadways creating icy conditions. This area includes portions of south-central Elko county, with US Highway 93 and I-80 being the principle routes. The possibility of blowing snow over these roads will create patchy black ice conditions, thus making driving hazardous as black ice is very difficult to see at night. If traveling through the early morning hours, please use caution. Winds are expected to decrease through the night though slick conditions could continue into the late portions of this morning. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County
